COUNCIL:
What is your vision for the municipality of the above Council? (maximum 50 words)
I envisage a city where every resident can live safely and feel connected to community. I am
dedicated to ensuring that our public funds are managed with the utmost fiscal responsibility,
maximizing value and efficiency. I aspire towards thoughtful planning and community
engagement lead to lasting, positive impacts for everyone.

What expertise or attributes do you have which would help you in undertaking the role of Councillor?
Provide details (maximum 50 words)
Throughout my career, I have served the community as an executive leader in the non-profit
community sector and have been committed to service and making positive changes in my
community. As a custodian of taxpayer dollars, I have built my career on integrity, which I will
bring as your Councillor.
Have you read the current Council Plan for the council named above?
Have you read the current Councillor Code of Conduct for the council named above?

Are you endorsed by a registered political party?
Note: Registered political party has the same meaning as in Part 4 of the Electoral Act 2002.
If yes, provide the name of the registered political party.

If yes, what has been your attendance record at Council meetings during your
current term of office?
Note: Council meetings means Council meetings referred to in section 61 of the Local Government Act 2020 but
does not include meetings held for which a Councillor has been granted leave from attending by the Council.

What are your contact details (so that voters can contact you)? Provide details
